pricing_notes: Recommended price maintains ≥$1 contribution while positioning slightly under competitor MSRP.

pricing_notes: Recommended price maintains ≥$1 contribution while positioning slightly under competitor MSRP.

pricing_notes: Recommended price maintains ≥$1 contribution while positioning slightly under competitor MSRP.

pricing_notes: Pass-through fee; match public MSRP to avoid subsidizing the service.
use_cases: Ongoing post-hire monitoring for finance, healthcare, or education organizations that require continuous alerts.
compliance_notes: FCRA + state monitoring laws (e.g., CA ICRAA). Provide opt-in and adverse action notices for new hits.
competitor_notes: Monthly monitoring fee per individual.

pricing_notes: Bundle undercuts Checkr Basic+ while covering vendor spend and ~$0.34 Vuplicity automation/hosting.
use_cases: Pre-employment screening bundle covering SSN trace, national criminal, and sex offender search—mirrors Checkr Basic+ for volume hiring funnels.
compliance_notes: FCRA governs consumer reports; follow adverse action process. Includes SSN, national criminal, sex offender components; respect local ban-the-box laws.
cost_notes: InformData SSN + NatCrim + SOR plus ~$0.34 Vuplicity automation/hosting allocation.
competitor_notes: Benchmarked against Checkr Basic+ MSRP; retains $26+ headroom after automation/hosting.
